data.lyric:
[ti:Ghost Story]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Ghost Story]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.45]Ghost Story - Carrie Underwood
[00:01.48]Lyrics by：David Garcia/Hillary Lindsey/Josh Kear
[00:03.29]Composed by：David Garcia/Hillary Lindsey/Josh Kear
[00:04.83]
[00:12.52]You're gonna see a shadow
[00:15.89]
[00:17.19]Midnight playing tricks with your head
[00:20.73]
[00:22.41]A silhouette float down the hallway
[00:26.31]
[00:27.21]And you'll reach for the light by your bed
[00:30.80]
[00:32.55]You'll hear a noise
[00:33.40]Swear you know the voice
[00:34.73]And you'll chase it down the stairs
[00:36.59]
[00:37.52]You'll look around
[00:38.45]Not a single sound
[00:39.69]'Cause there's no one even there
[00:41.68]
[00:42.81]I'm gonna be your ghost story
[00:47.61]That keeping you up all night memory
[00:52.45]I'll be haunting you you'll be wanting me
[00:57.24]
[00:57.79]I'm gonna be your ghost story
[01:02.62]Your ghost story
[01:05.19]
[01:07.57]Your ghost story
[01:12.10]
[01:13.78]You'll be sitting at home drinking 'bout me
[01:17.87]
[01:18.74]When I'm out with my friends at the bar
[01:22.47]
[01:23.90]But there ain't enough whiskey
[01:26.59]For you not to miss me
[01:29.01]I'll be waiting at the bottom of the bottle in the dark
[01:33.10]I'm gonna be your ghost story
[01:37.88]That keeping you up all night memory
[01:42.70]I'll be haunting you you'll be wanting me
[01:47.42]
[01:48.11]I'm gonna be your ghost story
[01:52.93]Your ghost story yeah
[01:58.06]Your ghost story
[01:59.97]
[02:03.99]You'll wish you never said goodbye
[02:06.57]Wish you'd never let me go
[02:09.02]Let the love between us die
[02:10.99]
[02:11.58]You can carve it into stone
[02:13.85]
[02:14.70]I'm gonna be your ghost story
[02:19.38]That keeping you up all night memory
[02:24.29]I'll be haunting you you'll be wanting me
[02:29.75]I'm gonna be your ghost story
[02:34.01]
[02:34.58]Your ghost story yeah yeah
[02:39.55]Your ghost story yeah yeah
[02:44.47]I'll be haunting you you'll be wanting me
[02:49.80]I'm gonna be your ghost story
[02:54.71]Your ghost story
data.trans:
[ti:Ghost Story]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Ghost Story]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.45]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.48]//
[00:03.29]//
[00:04.83]
[00:12.52]你将会看到一个暗影
[00:15.89]
[00:17.19]在午夜时分 捉弄着你的脑袋
[00:20.73]
[00:22.41]一个影子飘过走廊
[00:26.31]
[00:27.21]你会伸手打开床边的台灯
[00:30.80]
[00:32.55]你会听到嘈杂的声音
[00:33.40]你发誓你认识那声音
[00:34.73]你会循着声音走下楼梯
[00:36.59]
[00:37.52]你环顾四周
[00:38.45]万籁俱寂
[00:39.69]因为房子里空无一人
[00:41.68]
[00:42.81]我会成为让你恐惧的鬼故事
[00:47.61]变成让你彻夜难眠的可怕回忆
[00:52.45]我会对你纠缠不休 你会需要我的陪伴
[00:57.24]
[00:57.79]我会成为让你恐惧的鬼故事
[01:02.62]让你恐惧的鬼故事
[01:05.19]
[01:07.57]让你恐惧的鬼故事
[01:12.10]
[01:13.78]你会静静地坐在家里 为我借酒消愁
[01:17.87]
[01:18.74]而我与朋友在酒吧里寻欢作乐
[01:22.47]
[01:23.90]但是家里没有足够的威士忌酒
[01:26.59]让你将我忘得一干二净
[01:29.01]黑暗之中 我会等你将一瓶酒饮尽
[01:33.10]我会成为让你恐惧的鬼故事
[01:37.88]变成让你彻夜难眠的可怕回忆
[01:42.70]我会对你纠缠不休 你会需要我的陪伴
[01:47.42]
[01:48.11]我会成为让你恐惧的鬼故事
[01:52.93]让你恐惧的鬼故事
[01:58.06]让你恐惧的鬼故事
[01:59.97]
[02:03.99]你会希望你从未与我告别
[02:06.57]希望你永远不会放开我的手
[02:09.02]让我们之间的爱消失殆尽
[02:10.99]
[02:11.58]你可以将这段感情镌刻在墓石上
[02:13.85]
[02:14.70]我会成为让你恐惧的鬼故事
[02:19.38]变成让你彻夜难眠的可怕回忆
[02:24.29]我会对你纠缠不休 你会需要我的陪伴
[02:29.75]我会成为让你恐惧的鬼故事
[02:34.01]
[02:34.58]让你恐惧的鬼故事
[02:39.55]让你恐惧的鬼故事
[02:44.47]我会对你纠缠不休 你会需要我的陪伴
[02:49.80]我会成为让你恐惧的鬼故事
[02:54.71]让你恐惧的鬼故事
